wikipedia_page.main: Francis Hugh Bacon (24 June 1869 – 31 October 1915) was an English first-class cricketer. He was a right-handed batsman and a right-arm slow bowler.

response: Francis Bacon (1561–1626) was an English Elizabethan philosopher, statesman and essayist.
Francis Bacon may also refer to:
* Francis Bacon (artist) (1909–1992), Irish-born English figurative painter
